content: Thank you for sharing. I admire your initiatives and totally agree with everything in this article. To follow up with preventing technology from overtaking too much time from our lives, I have been turning on the grayscale setting on the phone and computer screens. Grayscale helps prevent the extra stimulations which keep the brain immersed into the displays. At least for me. I would keep it on most of the time, but turn it off when color is necessary for the experience. Just my two cents. This may not work for everyone, but I recommend everyone to give it a try. It improved my life! :)
